banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Art that brings words to life
videoData.socialTitle: Art that brings words to life

nodes.whoTheyAre: Stephen Doyle leads a double life: by day, he runs a much-lauded design firm; but after-hours, he is the maker of radically inventive art. He is the creative director of Doyle Partners, a New York City studio that creates graphics, environmental installations and animations for a global roster of clients, while his artworks have been featured in The New Yorker, The New York Times, Wired, Vanity Fair and other publications.

videoData.description: What if words did more than just sit on a page or a screen? Graphic designer Stephen Doyle creates art that expands on the literal meanings of words. This playful talk could shift your perspective on how you see language.
videoData.socialDescription: What if words did more than just sit on a page or a screen? Graphic designer Stephen Doyle creates art that expands on the literal meanings of words. This playful talk could shift your perspective on how you see language.
